name: STG 33-10
description:
Shmup made in 4 days for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.

Keys:

6/D/Right
4/A/Left8/W/Up2/S/Down0/X to Slow Time
5/Space to Fire

Credits:

GodotSlothDevLlamaDQG (smol font)

I used particles for the engine fx, it would be better if it was a togglable option.

Some features  are in the game but not implemented: 4 fire types, better enemies, health pickup
